title: Kathy
brief_description: Discusses the symptoms and cure of the prevalent venereal disease gonorrhea. The dramatised story of Kathy explains how it is contracted and what harm it can do to the body. She contracts gonorrhea from her boyfriend then goes to a public health centre to be examined and treated.

She contracts gonorrhea from her boyfriend then goes to a public health centre to be examined and treated.
